mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_title, post_content, user_id, create_at) VALUES (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.user_id, p.create_at, u.nickname FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.user_id, p.create_at, u.nickname FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_title = #{postTitle}, post_content = #{postContent}, WHERE post_id = #{postId}
